    • Method Detail

      • getInputDataObjectsAndAttributes

        @GET
 @Path(value="scenario/{scenarioId}/instance/{instanceId}/inputset/{inputsetId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getInputDataObjectsAndAttributes(@PathParam(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                                                                         int scenarioId,
                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="instanceId")
                                                                                                                                                         int scenarioInstanceId,
                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="inputsetId")
                                                                                                                                                         int inputsetId)
        This method responds to a GET request by returning an array of dataObjectsInstances with their dataAttributeInstances belonging to an inputSet. The outcome is specified by:
        Parameters:
        scenarioId - This is the databaseID of the scenario.
        scenarioInstanceId - This is the databaseID of the scenarioInstance of the aforementioned scenario.
        inputsetId - This is the databaseID of an inputSet belonging to this scenarioInstance.
        Returns:
        a response consisting of: an array of dataObjectsInstances with their dataAttributeInstances [also as an array]. a response status code: A 200 if everything is correct. A 404 Not Found is returned if the scenario/scenarioInstance/inputSetInstance is non-existing & with an error message instead of the array.

      • getOutputDataObjectsAndAttributes

        @GET
 @Path(value="scenario/{scenarioId}/instance/{instanceId}/outputset/{outputsetId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getOutputDataObjectsAndAttributes(@PathParam(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                                                                            int scenarioID,
                                                                                                                                                            @PathParam(value="instanceId")
                                                                                                                                                            int scenarioInstanceId,
                                                                                                                                                            @PathParam(value="outputsetId")
                                                                                                                                                            int outputsetID)
        This method responds to a GET request by returning an array of dataObjectsInstances with their dataAttributeInstances belonging to an outputSet. The outcome is specified by:
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - This is the databaseID of the scenario.
        scenarioInstanceId - This is the databaseID of the scenarioInstance of the aforementioned scenario.
        outputsetID - This is the databaseID of an outputSet belonging to this scenarioInstance.
        Returns:
        a response consisting of: an array of dataObjectsInstances with their dataAttributeInstances also as an array. a response status code: A 200 if everything is correct. A 404 Not Found is returned if the scenario/scenarioInstance/outputSetInstance is non-existing with an error message instead of the array.

      • getInputDataObjects

        @GET
 @Path(value="scenario/{scenarioId}/instance/{instanceId}/activityinstance/{activityInstanceId}/input")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getInputDataObjects(@Context
                                                                                                                                                                  javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                                                                                  int scenarioId,
                                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="instanceId")
                                                                                                                                                                  int instanceId,
                                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="activityInstanceId")
                                                                                                                                                                  int activityInstanceId)
        This method responds to a GET request by returning an array of inputSets. Each contains the inputSetDatabaseID, the name of the dataObject and their state as a Map & a link to get the dataObjectInstances with their dataAttributesInstances. The result is determined by:
        Parameters:
        uriInfo - A UriInfo object that holds the server context used for the link.
        scenarioId - The databaseID of the scenario.
        instanceId - The databaseID of the scenarioInstance belonging to the aforementioned scenario.
        activityInstanceId - The databaseID of the activityInstance belonging to this scenarioInstance.
        Returns:
        a response consisting of: array of inputSets containing the inputSetDatabaseID, the name of the dataObject and their state as a Map & a link to get the dataObjectInstances with their dataAttributesInstances. a response status code:

        A 200 if everything was correct. A 404 Not Found is returned if the scenario/scenarioInstance/activityInstance is non-existing or if the activity has no inputSet & with an error message instead of the array.

      • getOutputDataObjects

        @GET
 @Path(value="scenario/{scenarioId}/instance/{instanceId}/activityinstance/{activityInstanceId}/output")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getOutputDataObjects(@Context
                                                                                                                                                                    javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                                                                                    int scenarioID,
                                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="instanceId")
                                                                                                                                                                    int scenarioInstanceID,
                                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="activityInstanceId")
                                                                                                                                                                    int activityInstanceId)
        This method responds to a GET request by returning an array of outputSets. Each contains the outputSetDatabaseID, the name of the dataObject and their state as a Map & a link to get the dataObjectInstances with their dataAttributesInstances. The result is determined by:
        Parameters:
        uriInfo - A UriInfo object, which holds the server context used for the link.
        scenarioID - The databaseID of the scenario.
        scenarioInstanceID - The databaseID of the scenarioInstance belonging to the aforementioned scenario.
        activityInstanceId - The databaseID of the activityInstance belonging to this scenarioInstance.
        Returns:
        a response consisting of: array of outputSets containing the outputSetDatabaseID, the name of the dataObject and their state as a Map & a link to get the dataObjectInstances with their dataAttributesInstances. a response status code:

        A 200 if everything was correct. A 404 Not Found is returned if the scenario/scenarioInstance/activityInstance is non-existing or if the activity has no outputSet & with an error message instead of the array.

 @Path(value="scenario/{scenarioId}/instance/{instanceId}/activity/{activityId}/availableInput")
